mapper.sql: briefing_id,briefing_no, user_id, project_id, word_template_id, survey_time, survey_place,survey_lat,survey_lng, insurer, insurer_name, insurer_phone, surveyor, accident_description, loss_description, next_work, main_surveyor, sub_surveyor, manager, briefing_file, remark, create_time
mapper.select: select a.briefing_id,a.briefing_no, a.user_id, a.project_id, a.word_template_id, a.survey_time, a.survey_place,a.survey_lat, a.survey_lng, a.insurer,a.insurer_name, a.insurer_phone, a.surveyor, a.accident_description, a.loss_description, a.next_work,a.main_surveyor, a.sub_surveyor, a.manager, a.briefing_file, a.remark, a.create_time,b.project_name from briefing a left JOIN project b on a.project_id=b.project_id where a.briefing_id = #{briefingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
